title: Elasticity
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating how elasticity affects energy loss during ball collisions with surfaces.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Physics
Mechanics
Collisions
learningObjectives: Define elasticity and coefficient of restitution
Explain energy conservation in elastic vs inelastic collisions
Predict bouncing behavior based on elasticity values

controls.description: Starts or pauses the ball motion

controls.name: Elasticity
controls.description: Controls the coefficient of restitution for bounces

limitations: Does not show energy values numerically
